name: Hoffco Brands
tag_list: car-chargers, wall-chargers, cell-phone-accessories, flashlights, led-flashlights, electronics-accessories, ipad-accessories, iphone-accessories, ipod-accessories, blackberry-accessories, chargers, cases, cell-phone-cases
overview:
Hoffco Brands, Inc. is a privately held company that supplies a wide variety of products relevant to the consumer electronics industry. Hoffco’s pride is in brand marketing. Their goal to provide the best products and the highest rated customer satisfaction for all of their brands.

Hoffco’s current brands include CelltronixÂ®, Hawk Optix, NorliteÂ®, amongst others. Hoffco also supplies cell phone accessories and flashlights using the AMP ENERGYÂ® license. The motivation for Hoffco Brands comes from the demand of the consumer. They research current trends and create a product that not only satisfies the demand of the customer but also provides great source of revenue for retailers and distributors.

Hoffco boasts outstanding and innovative retail merchandising options that satisfy almost any retailer’s concerns for product placement.
